name: Gallery PsyGan
description:
Walk around and explore the different AI generated worlds within the gallery. There are 40 unique locations to discover. Stand in the center of one of the white markers for an optimal viewing angle into one of the worlds.

If you are getting dizzy, press the tilde key (~) to open the console and type the command "FOV 120". If it is running slow, try the command "Screen Percentage 70" (or lower).

Controls:

W/A/S/D = Movement

Space = Jump

Mouse = Look
